text: The Man Who Loved Cat Dancing is a 1973 American romantic western movie directed by Richard C. Sarafian and based on the novel of the same name by Marilyn Durham. It stars Burt Reynolds, Sarah Miles, Lee J. Cobb, Jack Warden, George Hamilton, Bo Hopkins and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 romance movies Category:1970s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard C. Sarafian
title: The Man Who Loved Cat Dancing
